name: Chen
title: Holy Knight
lore: Born in the desert of Hazhadal Baab, Chen was called the Holy Knight for bringing warriors of the wild into the faith.

penitence.name: Penitence
penitence.description: Forces an enemy to feel remorse, slowing them and causing them to take more damage.

holyPersuasion.name: Holy Persuasion
holyPersuasion.description: Converts enemy creeps to fight for Chen, gaining their abilities.

divineFavor.name: Divine Favor
divineFavor.description: Chen and his converted creeps gain bonus HP regeneration and attack speed.

handOfGod.name: Hand of God
handOfGod.description: Heals all allied heroes and controlled units globally.

25: Hand of God Grants 75% Magic Resistance
